email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for 80,000 MT Crude Oil
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for your 80,000 MT crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, DWT 100,000, LOA 230m. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per MT. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for 80,000 MT Crude Oil
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit high for us. Could you consider lowering it to the low $50s? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for 80,000 MT Crude Oil
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can lower the freight rate to $50.75 per MT. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for 80,000 MT Crude Oil
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.75 sounds reasonable. However, we would prefer the demurrage rate to be capped at $20,000 per day. Can you accommodate this? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for 80,000 MT Crude Oil
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve discussed with the owner, and we can agree to cap the demurrage at $20,000 per day. Shall we proceed with the fixture? Let me know if you need any further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for 80,000 MT Crude Oil
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that works for us. Let’s proceed with the fixture. Please send over the recap for review. Thanks for your flexibility. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap for 80,000 MT Crude Oil
email_chain.body: Hi John, please find the fixture recap attached. To summarize: Vessel MV Ocean Star, 80,000 MT crude oil, Rotterdam to Singapore, laycan 15-20 October, freight rate $50.75 per MT, demurrage capped at $20,000 per day. Let me know if everything looks good. Best regards, Sarah
